caption.p: Photomicrograph showing the cytomorphological finds (A) H&E ×10; a H&E ×100) and immunohistochemical staining of the malignancy, positive for Ki-67 (B) IHC ×10; b IHC ×100), EMA (C) IHC ×10; c IHC ×100), CK8/18 (D) IHC ×10; d IHC ×100), TTF-1 (E) IHC ×10; e IHC ×100), CD34 (F) IHC ×10; f IHC ×100), CD31 (G) IHC ×10; g IHC ×100), and SMA (H) IHC ×10; h IHC ×100).
